text:
Created attachment 27411
two screenshots here mentioned in Description

In my case JMS Publisher has been failed with error - "User name or password is invalid" (see YH1136 in attachment).

I wont to see the message in "Request" tab. Currently the tab is displaying "No data to display". But the message was sent and I want to see it (see YH1137 in attachment).
creator: slavko_h@yahoo.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
This is currently a limitation, when request is not HTTP, no data is displayed.
So this is more an Enhancement than a bug.

Regards
Philippe Mouawad

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
In fact when you get this message, message has not been sent since connection was not established.
So It is not an error or a limitation.
It is ok so I close issue.
Agree - can be closed as not a bug.
creator: slavko_h@yahoo.com
